name: Srikanth Gunalapuri
objective: Front-End Developer with 3 years of experience in designing and developing responsive, user-friendly web applications. Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.js, React Hooks, Redux, Bootstrap, and Material-UI, with expertise in API integration and state management.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained responsive, user-friendly interfaces using React.js, React Hooks, and Redux.
Increased user engagement by 30% through dynamic and interactive front-end features.
Created reusable components and scalable UI libraries, reducing future development time by 40%.
Optimized application performance by 50% through efficient DOM manipulation and lazy loading.
Integrated APIs efficiently using Axios and improved data handling performance.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsive design with CSS3, Flexbox, and Grid.

projects.title: Arsha Tuitions
projects.summary: An online platform designed to provide educational services and resources for students, teachers, and administrators.
responsibilities: Developed a responsive UI using React.js, React Hooks, and Redux.
Styled components using Bootstrap 5, ANT Design, and Material-UI.
Implemented React Router for seamless navigation.
Applied JavaScript validations for enhanced form security.
Integrated REST APIs using Axios to fetch and display dynamic data.

projects.title: Vedarushi
projects.summary: A comprehensive spiritual service platform designed to simplify the booking of Poojas, Vratams, and personalized birthday wishes.
responsibilities: Designed and developed dynamic login and signup pages with an intuitive UI/UX.
Created and optimized reusable UI components.
Integrated RESTful API calls using Axios and Fetch.
Implemented front-end optimization techniques to enhance performance.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness.
